title: do I have or need an account
content: So because of the name change, I am prompted to ask "do I even have an account?" The fact that I am able to even ask you this question must mean that I do. I have been using Firefox and Thunderbird for years and never new that it / they needed or came with an account. So I apparently have an account. Now what? What can or should I do with it? Paul Conaway ConawayNY@aol.com
creator: ConawayNY

title: My password and recovery codes are wrong?
content: I was trying to login onto a new browser, but it said my password was wrong. I tried again a few times and it still said it was wrong. So I tried resetting the password using my recovery code, but it also says my recovery codes are wrong. I have never used my recovery codes on this account, what can I do? I don't want to lose my bookmarks and this account has all my passwords on it. I have the account tied to my google acc, but I don't have that sign in option on my other browser. What can I do?
creator: tsukihi1703

title: Self created install and sync issue. How do i get fix this problem
content: New to me Surface3 pro tablet. Have FF on my desktop, want it on the tablet and synced with the desktop. Download and install were fine up until i went to log in on the tablet. I mis spelled the email address and did not notice until the codes never arrived. I cant find a way to get FF to "forget" what i entered. I uninstalled hoping that would do it and deleted the FF old data file it saved on the screen, but no matter what i do it keeps coming back to the old misspelled entry and does not let me log out or change it. What to do! Tablet is running W10 Pro Send this from my desktop also running W10Pro
creator: callwill

title: error code 232011
content: When I try to watch a movie (on website flixhq.to) it gives me error code 232011 and then i change the server my subtitles don't work. I tried different websites but the same thing happens. I've done all the troubleshoot methods possible. I only have this problem on my laptop, when i use this website on my phone it works properly. I've never had a problem with this website before ,this all started beginning of this month. Someone please help me fix this!
creator: nerdyy746
